author: Andy Gregory, Andy Gregory
title: Coronavirus lockdowns now covering 20% of global population
description: More than 1.5bn people across the world facing new restrictions to personal freedoms
content:
Nearly one in five people around the world are currently subject to lockdown measures as a result of coronavirus.
The UK population was far from alone in grappling with the surreal reality of what several newspapersdubbed house arrest as it awoke on Tuesday … [+3975 chars]
